ValidationRule.description: Before converting a Lead to an Opportunity, we expect Sales update that Lead to “Qualified.” They will be prompted with required fields that help with reporting and that help us better tailor the sales experience.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Permission.Bypass_Defined_VR_s = FALSE && Bypass_VR_and_Automation__c = FALSE &&
( ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(Status) || ISCHANGED(Industry) || ISCHANGED(Primary_Practice_Area__c) ) &&
TEXT(Status) = "Qualified" && TEXT(Industry) = "Law" && ISBLANK(TEXT(Primary_Practice_Area__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Primary Practice Area is required when Industry is "Law" and Status is "Qualified."
